column4: another question. i installed feisty fawn about a week ago, but as someone just mentioned, gutsy will be released soon. how hard is it to update to whole new versions of ubuntu? will it just come up in the updates manager... ??
it should be offered automatically.
wow cool, so i just agree, and then i have the latest version?
that's the idea. :)
dude, that'd go way fast. packets go faster downhill right?
doh, didn't think of that. ;)
thats a standard port. you should pick a random one
that's the max port. 6881 is the min port. it will use all inbetween :)
some isps will block standard bittorrent ports
why would you need more than one port :S
he said he had good connection/speed in windows so that is probably not the problem :)
ya.
no it wont ?
I get crap speed until i set a port range
i happily get better that 1mByte/s using just one port
using Azureus on ubuntu
that's lucky :)
hey... i wonder what i'll get if i do a range?!?
try and find out :)
how do i set a port range in azureus?
no idea.
